short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy (subset) of open tabs to your clipboard in a hyperlink format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily select and copy the URLs of your open tabs directly to your clipboard in a convenient hyperlink format with the Tab-to-Link browser extension. Perfect for quickly sharing or organizing links, this tool allows you to paste multiple links, formatted hyperlinks into your note-taking app*, document, or email, streamlining your workflow. Whether you're conducting research, managing resources, or simply saving links for later, Tab-to-Link makes it effortless.

*Currently, automatic hyperlink formatting upon pasting is supported only in apps that accept the Markdown-style hyperlink format.
